version_description:
Some improvements update.
- membership card limitation has been fixed.
- Improved Connection to bpay.
- App crashes have been fixed.
- Some input text didn't activated when device had been paired with bluetooth keyboard. Bug has been fixed.
- When Session had been expired, Communication errors have been fixed.

*App name changed(BPAY Manager to eCARD Manager) due to patent policy.
*Usability improved
-Available to add AMEX 4DBC code
-Tapcode setting changed
-BLE connection feature improved

New Feature and Update
- New Animation added In Card Addition View
- Improvement of Card Connection

New Features and Improvements
- Manual Device Scanning way added
- Notice Menu added
- Sign Up way improved
- Find Password way improved

Connection bug is fixed.
Added Auto-Connection when app is foreground state.(Except Security Lv1)
Barcode Scanning limit-length is changed.

*New features
-Data Blind
-Adding JIS2 membership

*Updates
-Setting security level (design improvement)
-Adding membership card (method of saving data changed)

*All membership card data will be deleted due to changes
in the method of saving your membership card.
Please re-register your membership card

Minor updated and Crash bug fixed
- Add barcode display when the magnet stripe and number manually input.

Change the Data Blind Location.
Add deletion feature at Sync Fail.
Need Help link address change.
Fixed "4DBC" Data Blind Error.

App Crash fixed.
Email field allows underscore and dash mark.
Barcode Code93 added.
Sync-Fail fixed(All deletion Added).

Enhanced security
- Transmitting only 8 card numbers out of whole 16 numbers. Sensitive Data which may cause a security problem is not sent to APP
- Since Bluetooth is not activated prior to unlocking of passcode. Passcode unlock cannot be hacked by Bluetooth hacking
Bug fixed
Visual design optimization for iPhoneX

Enhanced security
- Transmitting only 8 card numbers out of whole 16 numbers. Sensitive Data which may cause a security problem is not sent to APP
- Since Bluetooth is not activated prior to unlocking of passcode. Passcode unlock cannot be hacked by Bluetooth hacking
Bug fixed
- Messages are modified
Visual design optimization for iPhoneX

Changed the limit of eCARD's name to 13 characters.
Bug fixes and stability improvements.
- Last location tracking without card connection has enabled
